name: csabourin/spaghetti-migrator
description: Spaghetti Migrator - Untangles your nested subfolders and migrates assets between cloud services. A production-grade Craft CMS 4/5 plugin with checkpoint/resume, rollback capabilities, and zero-downtime support.

extra.name: Spaghetti Migrator
extra.description: Untangles your nested subfolders and migrates assets between cloud services with ease

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (!file_exists('config/migration-config.php')) { copy('vendor/csabourin/spaghetti-migrator/config/migration-config.php', 'config/migration-config.php'); echo 'Created config/migration-config.php - Please configure it before running migrations.\n'; }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (!file_exists('config/migration-config.php')) { copy('vendor/csabourin/spaghetti-migrator/config/migration-config.php', 'config/migration-config.php'); echo 'Created config/migration-config.php - Please configure it before running migrations.\n'; }"
